mapper.select: SELECT a.auction_num, a.reg_price, a.item_num, a.member_id, i.item_num FROM auction a JOIN itemList i ON a.item_num = i.item_num WHERE i.item_num =#{itemNum} ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(a.auction_num, 5) AS UNSIGNED) DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auction (reg_price, item_num, member_id) VALUES (#{regPrice}, #{itemNum}, #{memberId}) ;
